rev.comment: "proprietary" should be avoided since it does not have a clear meaning (closed-source? patented? non-documented?)
rev.diff:
Line 41: Line 41:
== Limitations ==
== Limitations ==
â
The backup functionality uses a proprietary binary file format (.nbu), which can only be used to restore to a phone. This means that the data can only be accessed by doing a restore to a working phone. Third-party programs (either commercial or free) can be used to read the file, but they greatly vary in the amount of information they can retrieve.
+
The backup functionality uses a non-documented binary file format (.nbu), which can only be used to restore to a phone. This means that the data can only be accessed by doing a restore to a working phone. Third-party programs (either commercial or free) can be used to read the file, but they greatly vary in the amount of information they can retrieve.
=== Nokia PC Sync ===
=== Nokia PC Sync ===
